explains: v. 给……定价（price 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: transfer pricing 转让定价；调拨定价
congestion pricing 拥挤收费；堵车费；高峰期行车收费
option pricing model 期权定价模式
capital asset pricing model 资本资产评价模型
predatory pricing 掠夺性订价；掠夺性价格
pricing structure 价格结构；价格体系
marginal cost pricing [经]按边际成本定价
options pricing model 期权定价模式

sentences.en: It's hard to maintain competitive pricing.
sentences.cn: 很难保持有竞争力的定价。

sentences.en: The company says they're able to keep pricing competitive.
sentences.cn: 这个公司说他们能够保持价格竞争力。

sentences.en: Predatory pricing by large supermarkets was threatening the livelihood of smaller businesses.
sentences.cn: 大型超市的掠夺性定价正威胁着小商店的生计。
